sentences.en: I eat breakfast at seven o'clock every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上七点钟吃早餐。

sentences.en: Eating breakfast is good for our health.
sentences.zh: 吃早餐对我们的健康有好处。

sentences.en: I have class every Monday morning.
sentences.zh: 我每周一早上有课。

sentences.en: We will have class in the computer room tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们明天将在电脑室上课。

sentences.en: I like to play sports every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天做运动。

sentences.en: Playing sports is good for our health.
sentences.zh: 做运动对我们的健康有好处。

sentences.en: I like to exercise every morning.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天早上锻炼。

sentences.en: Exercise is good for our health.
sentences.zh: 锻炼对我们的健康有好处。

sentences.en: I like to do morning exercises every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天做早操。

sentences.en: Doing morning exercises helps me stay healthy.
sentences.zh: 做早操帮助我保持健康。

sentences.en: I usually eat dinner with my family at 7 PM.
sentences.zh: 我通常在晚上7点和家人一起吃晚餐。

sentences.en: She likes to eat dinner before watching TV.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在看电视前吃晚餐。

sentences.en: I need to clean my room today.
sentences.zh: 我今天需要打扫我的房间。

sentences.en: Cleaning my room makes it tidy and comfortable.
sentences.zh: 打扫我的房间能让它变得整洁又舒适。

sentences.en: I like to go for a walk after dinner.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢晚饭后去散步。

sentences.en: We often go for a walk in the park on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我们周末经常去公园散步。

sentences.en: I often go shopping with my friends on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我经常在周末和朋友们去购物。

sentences.en: She needs to go shopping to buy some vegetables.
sentences.zh: 她需要去购物买一些蔬菜。

sentences.en: Can you take this book to the library?
sentences.zh: 你能把这本书带到图书馆吗？

sentences.en: I need to take my umbrella because it might rain.
sentences.zh: 我需要带上我的伞，因为可能会下雨。

sentences.en: She loves dancing in the park.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在公园里跳舞。

sentences.en: We are dancing to the music.
sentences.zh: 我们正随着音乐跳舞。

sentences.en: I want to take a dancing class this weekend.
sentences.zh: 这个周末我想去上一节舞蹈课。

sentences.en: She often takes a dancing class to relax.
sentences.zh: 她经常上舞蹈课来放松。

sentences.en: When is your birthday?
sentences.zh: 你的生日是什么时候？

sentences.en: When do you usually get up?
sentences.zh: 你通常什么时候起床？

sentences.en: We will go to the park after lunch.
sentences.zh: 午饭后我们将去公园。

sentences.en: She always does her homework after school.
sentences.zh: 她总是放学后做家庭作业。

sentences.en: The meeting will start at 9 AM.
sentences.zh: 会议将于上午9点开始。

sentences.en: Please start your homework now.
sentences.zh: 请现在开始你的作业。

sentences.en: I usually get up at 7 o'clock in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我通常早上七点起床。

sentences.en: She usually walks to school with her friends.
sentences.zh: 她通常和朋友们步行去学校。

sentences.en: Spain is a country in southwestern Europe.
sentences.zh: 西班牙是欧洲西南部的一个国家。

sentences.en: Madrid is the capital city of Spain.
sentences.zh: 马德里是西班牙的首都城市。

sentences.en: I am late for school.
sentences.zh: 我上学迟到了。

sentences.en: He often arrives late.
sentences.zh: 他经常迟到。

sentences.en: School usually starts at 8 a.m.
sentences.zh: 学校通常在上午8点开始上课。

sentences.en: I have breakfast at 7 a.m. every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上7点吃早餐。

sentences.en: School ends at 3 p.m. every day.
sentences.zh: 学校每天下午3点放学。

sentences.en: We usually have dinner at 6 p.m.
sentences.zh: 我们通常下午6点吃晚饭。

sentences.en: Why are you late today?
sentences.zh: 你今天为什么迟到？

sentences.en: She asked why he didn't come.
sentences.zh: 她问他为什么没来。

sentences.en: I go to the shop to buy milk.
sentences.zh: 我去商店买牛奶。

sentences.en: The shop near my home opens at 8 am.
sentences.zh: 我家附近的商店早上8点开门。

sentences.en: I go to work every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上去上班。

sentences.en: Work hard and you will succeed.
sentences.zh: 努力工作，你就会成功。

sentences.en: This is the last book on the shelf.
sentences.zh: 这是书架上的最后一本书。

sentences.en: She was the last to arrive at the party.
sentences.zh: 她是最后一个到达派对的。

sentences.en: I can hear a loud sound outside.
sentences.zh: 我能听到外面很大的声音。

sentences.en: Sound travels through the air to our ears.
sentences.zh: 声音通过空气传到我们的耳朵。

sentences.en: I like apples, and I also like bananas.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢苹果，并且我也喜欢香蕉。

sentences.en: She is good at singing, and she also dances well.
sentences.zh: 她擅长唱歌，并且她也跳舞跳得很好。

sentences.en: She is busy with her homework.
sentences.zh: 她忙着做家庭作业。

sentences.en: My father is always busy at work.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸总是忙于工作。

sentences.en: We need to study hard every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天需要努力学习。

sentences.en: She may need a pen to write the letter.
sentences.zh: 她可能需要一支钢笔来写这封信。

sentences.en: We like to play games in the park.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢在公园里玩游戏。

sentences.en: She can play the piano very well.
sentences.zh: 她钢琴弹得非常好。

sentences.en: She wrote a letter to her friend.
sentences.zh: 她给她的朋友写了一封信。

sentences.en: I received a letter from my parents yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天收到了父母的一封信。

sentences.en: We can watch a live concert on TV.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在电视上观看一场现场音乐会。

sentences.en: The singer is performing live on stage now.
sentences.zh: 这位歌手现在正在舞台上进行现场表演。

sentences.en: We spent our vacation on a beautiful island.
sentences.zh: 我们在一个美丽的岛上度过了假期。

sentences.en: Many birds live on the small island near the coast.
sentences.zh: 许多鸟儿生活在海岸附近的小岛上。

sentences.en: I always brush my teeth in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我总是在早上刷牙。

sentences.en: She always helps her mother with housework.
sentences.zh: 她总是帮妈妈做家务。

sentences.en: A cave is a natural underground hollow space.
sentences.zh: 洞穴是一种天然的地下中空空间。

sentences.en: Bats often live in dark caves during the day.
sentences.zh: 蝙蝠白天常住在黑暗的洞穴里。

sentences.en: I often go swimming on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我经常在周末去游泳。

sentences.en: Let's go swimming in the pool this afternoon.
sentences.zh: 今天下午我们去游泳池游泳吧。

sentences.en: I win the game.
sentences.zh: 我赢得了比赛。

sentences.en: She hopes to win the prize.
sentences.zh: 她希望赢得奖品。

sentences.en: Spring is the season when flowers bloom and trees turn green.
sentences.zh: 春天是花朵绽放、树木变绿的季节。

sentences.en: We often go hiking or have picnics in spring because the weather is warm.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在春天去远足或野餐，因为天气很温暖。

sentences.en: Summer is a hot season with long days.
sentences.zh: 夏天是一个白天很长的炎热季节。

sentences.en: We often go swimming in summer.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在夏天去游泳。

sentences.en: Autumn is the season when leaves turn red and yellow.
sentences.zh: 秋天是树叶变成红色和黄色的季节。

sentences.en: We often go hiking in autumn because the weather is cool.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在秋天去远足，因为天气很凉爽。

sentences.en: Winter is the coldest season of the year.
sentences.zh: 冬天是一年中最冷的季节。

sentences.en: We often make snowmen in winter.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在冬天堆雪人。

sentences.en: Spring is a beautiful season with flowers blooming.
sentences.zh: 春天是鲜花盛开的美丽季节。

sentences.en: We often go hiking in the autumn season.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在秋季去远足。

sentences.en: We will have a picnic in the park this Sunday.
sentences.zh: 这个星期天我们将在公园野餐。

sentences.en: She prepared sandwiches and fruit for the picnic.
sentences.zh: 她为野餐准备了三明治和水果。

sentences.en: We plan to go on a picnic in the park this Sunday.
sentences.zh: 我们计划这个周日去公园野餐。

sentences.en: She loves to go on a picnic with her family during holidays.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在假期和家人一起去野餐。

sentences.en: Can you pick a book for me?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我挑选一本书吗？

sentences.en: I need to pick some fruit from the tree.
sentences.zh: 我需要从树上摘一些水果。

sentences.en: We go to the orchard to pick apples in autumn.
sentences.zh: 秋天我们去果园摘苹果。

sentences.en: My dad helps me pick apples from the tall tree.
sentences.zh: 爸爸帮我从高高的树上摘苹果。

sentences.en: A snowman is made of snow.
sentences.zh: 雪人是用雪做的。

sentences.en: Children like to build a snowman in winter.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在冬天堆雪人。

sentences.en: We can make a snowman in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天我们可以堆雪人。

sentences.en: Let's go outside and make a snowman together.
sentences.zh: 让我们一起去外面堆雪人吧。

sentences.en: I like to go swimming in summer.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在夏天去游泳。

sentences.en: We often go swimming together on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在周末一起去游泳。

sentences.en: Which book do you want to read?
sentences.zh: 你想读哪本书？

sentences.en: Which color is your favorite?
sentences.zh: 你最喜欢哪种颜色？

sentences.en: My best friend helps me with my homework.
sentences.zh: 我最好的朋友帮我做作业。

sentences.en: This is the best day of my life.
sentences.zh: 这是我一生中最美好的一天。

sentences.en: Snow falls gently in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天雪轻轻地落下。

sentences.en: Children play in the snow happily.
sentences.zh: 孩子们在雪里开心地玩耍。

sentences.en: The teacher said "good job" to the student who finished the task.
sentences.zh: 老师对完成任务的学生说“干得好”。

sentences.en: When you do well, others may praise you with "good job".
sentences.zh: 当你做得好时，别人可能会用“干得好”来表扬你。

sentences.en: I stayed home because I was sick.
sentences.zh: 我因为生病待在家里。

sentences.en: She was late because the bus was delayed.
sentences.zh: 她迟到了，因为公交车晚点了。

sentences.en: I am going on vacation next month.
sentences.zh: 我下个月要去度假。

sentences.en: We had a great vacation at the beach.
sentences.zh: 我们在海滩度过了愉快的假期。

sentences.en: All students need to study hard.
sentences.zh: 所有学生都需要努力学习。

sentences.en: All books on the shelf are useful.
sentences.zh: 书架上的所有书都有用。

sentences.en: The rose is pink.
sentences.zh: 这朵玫瑰是粉色的。

sentences.en: She wears a pink dress.
sentences.zh: 她穿着一条粉色的连衣裙。

sentences.en: The lovely cat is playing with a ball.
sentences.zh: 这只可爱的猫正在玩球。

sentences.en: She has a lovely smile on her face.
sentences.zh: 她脸上带着可爱的微笑。

sentences.en: The leaf falls from the tree in autumn.
sentences.zh: 秋天，叶子从树上落下来。

sentences.en: A green leaf is like a small umbrella.
sentences.zh: 一片绿叶像一把小伞。

sentences.en: Leaves fall from the trees in autumn.
sentences.zh: 秋天树叶从树上落下来。

sentences.en: She likes to jump in the fall leaves.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在落叶中跳来跳去。

sentences.en: She likes to paint colorful pictures.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢画彩色的画。

sentences.en: We need a brush to paint the wall.
sentences.zh: 我们需要一把刷子来刷墙。

sentences.en: January is the first month of the year.
sentences.zh: 一月是一年中的第一个月。

sentences.en: My birthday is in January.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在一月。

sentences.en: February is the second month of the year.
sentences.zh: 二月是一年中的第二个月。

sentences.en: February often has 28 days, and 29 in a leap year.
sentences.zh: 二月通常有28天，闰年有29天。

sentences.en: March is the third month of the year.
sentences.zh: 三月是一年中的第三个月。

sentences.en: In many places, March brings warmer weather and blooming flowers.
sentences.zh: 在许多地方，三月带来更温暖的天气和盛开的花朵。

sentences.en: April is the fourth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 四月是一年中的第四个月。

sentences.en: We often have spring outings in April.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在四月去春游。

sentences.en: May is the fifth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 五月是一年中的第五个月份。

sentences.en: We often plant trees in May.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在五月植树。

sentences.en: June is the sixth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 六月是一年中的第六个月份。

sentences.en: My birthday is in June.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在六月。

sentences.en: July is the seventh month of the year.
sentences.zh: 七月是一年中的第七个月份。

sentences.en: We often have summer vacation in July.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在七月放暑假。

sentences.en: August is the eighth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 八月是一年中的第八个月份。

sentences.en: My birthday is in August.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在八月。

sentences.en: September is the ninth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 九月是一年中的第九个月份。

sentences.en: My birthday is in September.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在九月。

sentences.en: October is the tenth month of the year.
sentences.zh: 十月是一年中的第十个月份。

sentences.en: Halloween is celebrated on October 31st.
sentences.zh: 万圣节在10月31日庆祝。

sentences.en: November is the eleventh month of the year.
sentences.zh: 十一月是一年中的第十一个月。

sentences.en: Thanksgiving Day is usually celebrated in November in the United States.
sentences.zh: 在美国，感恩节通常在十一月庆祝。

sentences.en: December is the twelfth and last month of the year.
sentences.zh: 十二月是一年中的第十二个也是最后一个月。

sentences.en: Christmas is celebrated in December every year.
sentences.zh: 每年十二月都会庆祝圣诞节。

sentences.en: There are a few apples on the table.
sentences.zh: 桌子上有几个苹果。

sentences.en: I have few friends in this city.
sentences.zh: 我在这个城市几乎没有朋友。

sentences.en: A book is a useful thing.
sentences.zh: 书是有用的东西。

sentences.en: I need to find that thing.
sentences.zh: 我需要找到那个东西。

sentences.en: We will have a sports meet next Friday.
sentences.zh: 我们下周五将举办一场运动会。

sentences.en: Students are excited to participate in the sports meet.
sentences.zh: 学生们很兴奋能参加这场运动会。

sentences.en: I want to take a trip to the mountains.
sentences.zh: 我想去山里旅行。

sentences.en: We planned a trip to the beach next summer.
sentences.zh: 我们计划明年夏天去海滩旅行。

sentences.en: A year has twelve months.
sentences.zh: 一年有十二个月。

sentences.en: She was born last year.
sentences.zh: 她是去年出生的。

sentences.en: We plant trees in spring.
sentences.zh: 我们在春天种树。

sentences.en: The plant needs water and sunlight to grow.
sentences.zh: 这种植物需要水和阳光才能生长。

sentences.en: We will have a math contest next week.
sentences.zh: 下周我们将有一场数学竞赛。

sentences.en: She won first prize in the singing contest.
sentences.zh: 她在歌唱比赛中获得了一等奖。

sentences.en: The Great Wall is a famous ancient Chinese structure.
sentences.zh: 长城是中国著名的古代建筑。

sentences.en: Many people visit the Great Wall every year to admire its grandeur.
sentences.zh: 每年有许多人参观长城以欣赏它的宏伟。

sentences.en: The national flag is flying high.
sentences.zh: 国旗正在高高飘扬。

sentences.en: We should love our national culture.
sentences.zh: 我们应该热爱我们的民族文化。

sentences.en: National Day is a public holiday in many countries.
sentences.zh: 国庆节在许多国家是公共假日。

sentences.en: People often celebrate National Day with parades and fireworks.
sentences.zh: 人们通常会用游行和烟花庆祝国庆节。

sentences.en: She is an American student who loves learning Chinese.
sentences.zh: 她是一名热爱学习中文的美国学生。

sentences.en: American culture is very diverse and interesting.
sentences.zh: 美国文化非常多元化且有趣。

sentences.en: Thanksgiving is a holiday when people give thanks for their blessings.
sentences.zh: 感恩节是人们为所拥有的祝福表示感谢的节日。

sentences.en: Families often gather for a big meal on Thanksgiving.
sentences.zh: 家人们通常在感恩节聚在一起吃一顿丰盛的大餐。

sentences.en: Christmas is a holiday celebrated on December 25th.
sentences.zh: 圣诞节是在12月25日庆祝的节日。

sentences.en: People often decorate Christmas trees and exchange gifts during Christmas.
sentences.zh: 人们在圣诞节期间经常装饰圣诞树并交换礼物。

sentences.en: We often play a game after school.
sentences.zh: 我们放学后经常玩游戏。

sentences.en: This is an interesting game for children.
sentences.zh: 这是一个对孩子们来说有趣的游戏。

sentences.en: Can you solve this riddle?
sentences.zh: 你能解开这个谜语吗？

sentences.en: The riddle is fun and challenging.
sentences.zh: 这个谜语既有趣又有挑战性。

sentences.en: We need to act quickly.
sentences.zh: 我们需要迅速行动。

sentences.en: Her kind act made me happy.
sentences.zh: 她友善的举动让我开心。

sentences.en: Let's act out the story we read.
sentences.zh: 让我们把读过的故事表演出来。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to act out a dialogue in pairs.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们两人一组表演一段对话。

sentences.en: Please RSVP to the party invitation by Friday.
sentences.zh: 请在周五前回复派对邀请。

sentences.en: The RSVP deadline for the conference is next Monday.
sentences.zh: 会议回复的截止日期是下周一。

sentences.en: This book was written by my favorite author.
sentences.zh: 这本书是由我最喜欢的作者写的。

sentences.en: The cake was made by my mother yesterday.
sentences.zh: 这个蛋糕是我妈妈昨天做的。

sentences.en: I got the first place in the race.
sentences.zh: 我在比赛中获得了第一名。

sentences.en: Today is the first day of school.
sentences.zh: 今天是开学的第一天。

sentences.en: Today is the second day of the week.
sentences.zh: 今天是一周的第二天。

sentences.en: She got the second place in the race.
sentences.zh: 她在比赛中获得了第二名。

sentences.en: Today is the third day of the week.
sentences.zh: 今天是一周的第三天。

sentences.en: He finished in third place in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得了第三名。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the fourth of July.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在七月四日。

sentences.en: He finished fourth in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得第四名。

sentences.en: This is the fifth book on the shelf.
sentences.zh: 这是书架上的第五本书。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the 5th of May.
sentences.zh: 我的生日是五月五日。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the twelfth of March.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在3月12日。

sentences.en: He finished twelfth in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得第十二名。

sentences.en: The twentieth century saw many great inventions.
sentences.zh: 20世纪见证了许多伟大的发明。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the twentieth of March.
sentences.zh: 我的生日是3月20日。

sentences.en: We are living in the twenty-first (21st) century.
sentences.zh: 我们生活在21世纪。

sentences.en: Her birthday is on the twenty-first (21st) of March.
sentences.zh: 她的生日是3月21日。

sentences.en: My birthday is on the twenty-third (23rd) of March.
sentences.zh: 我的生日在3月23日。

sentences.en: He finished the twenty-third (23rd) task yesterday.
sentences.zh: 他昨天完成了第二十三项任务。

sentences.en: Today is the thirtieth (30th) of December.
sentences.zh: 今天是12月30日。

sentences.en: Her birthday is on the thirtieth (30th) of this month.
sentences.zh: 她的生日是这个月的30日。

sentences.en: This is another book.
sentences.zh: 这是另一本书。

sentences.en: She has other hobbies.
sentences.zh: 她有其他的爱好。

sentences.en: This is a special occasion for us.
sentences.zh: 这对我们来说是一个特殊的场合。

sentences.en: She has a special talent for music.
sentences.zh: 她在音乐方面有特殊的天赋。

sentences.en: Can you show me your new book?
sentences.zh: 你能给我看看你的新书吗？

sentences.en: The teacher will show us a video in class.
sentences.zh: 老师将在课堂上给我们看一段视频。

sentences.en: We celebrate many festivals throughout the year.
sentences.zh: 我们全年庆祝许多节日。

sentences.en: Christmas is a popular festival in Western countries.
sentences.zh: 圣诞节是西方国家一个受欢迎的节日。

sentences.en: The little kitten is playing with a ball.
sentences.zh: 这只小猫咪正在玩球。

sentences.en: I saw a cute kitten in the garden yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天在花园里看到一只可爱的小猫。

sentences.en: I keep a diary every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天写日记。

sentences.en: Her diary is full of secrets.
sentences.zh: 她的日记里充满了秘密。

sentences.en: The cat is still sleeping on the mat.
sentences.zh: 猫还在垫子上睡觉。

sentences.en: She still remembers her first day at school.
sentences.zh: 她仍然记得她上学的第一天。

sentences.en: The loud noise from the street kept me awake.
sentences.zh: 街上的巨大噪音让我无法入睡。

sentences.en: Please turn down the music; it's making too much noise.
sentences.zh: 请把音乐声调小一点，太吵了。

sentences.en: The cat has soft fur.
sentences.zh: 这只猫有柔软的毛。

sentences.en: I like the fur of the rabbit.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢兔子的毛。

sentences.en: Please open the door.
sentences.zh: 请打开门。

sentences.en: The shop is open now.
sentences.zh: 这家商店现在开门了。

sentences.en: I like to walk in the park every morning.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天早上在公园散步。

sentences.en: We walk to school together every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天一起步行去学校。

sentences.en: Is this book yours?
sentences.zh: 这本书是你的吗？

sentences.en: The red pen is yours.
sentences.zh: 这支红色的钢笔是你的。

sentences.en: His name is Tom.
sentences.zh: 他的名字是汤姆。

sentences.en: This is his book.
sentences.zh: 这是他的书。

sentences.en: The book on the desk is hers.
sentences.zh: 书桌上的书是她的。

sentences.en: Is this red bag hers?
sentences.zh: 这个红色的包是她的吗？

sentences.en: The red books on the shelf are theirs.
sentences.zh: 书架上的红色书本是他们的。

sentences.en: Is this umbrella theirs or yours?
sentences.zh: 这把伞是他们的还是你的？

sentences.en: The book on the desk is ours.
sentences.zh: 桌子上的那本书是我们的。

sentences.en: These toys belong to ours.
sentences.zh: 这些玩具属于我们。

sentences.en: He enjoys climbing mountains on weekends.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢在周末爬山。

sentences.en: Climbing requires strength and courage.
sentences.zh: 爬山需要力量和勇气。

sentences.en: I am eating breakfast now.
sentences.zh: 我现在正在吃早餐。

sentences.en: Eating fruits is good for health.
sentences.zh: 吃水果对健康有好处。

sentences.en: They are playing football in the park.
sentences.zh: 他们正在公园里踢足球。

sentences.en: She likes playing the piano every evening.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢每天晚上弹钢琴。

sentences.en: I like jumping high in the park.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在公园里跳高。

sentences.en: The rabbit is jumping over the grass.
sentences.zh: 兔子正在草地上跳跃。

sentences.en: Drinking enough water is good for health.
sentences.zh: 喝足够的水对健康有益。

sentences.en: She likes drinking milk in the morning.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在早上喝牛奶。

sentences.en: My cat is sleeping on the sofa.
sentences.zh: 我的猫正在沙发上睡觉。

sentences.en: She was sleeping when the phone rang.
sentences.zh: 电话铃响时她正在睡觉。

sentences.en: Each student has a book.
sentences.zh: 每个学生都有一本书。

sentences.en: We each have a pen.
sentences.zh: 我们每个人都有一支钢笔。

sentences.en: We should help each other.
sentences.zh: 我们应该互相帮助。

sentences.en: They often smile at each other.
sentences.zh: 他们经常互相微笑。

sentences.en: She was excited to receive the gift.
sentences.zh: 她收到礼物很兴奋。

sentences.en: The children are excited about the trip.
sentences.zh: 孩子们对这次旅行感到兴奋。

sentences.en: I like apples.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢苹果。

sentences.en: She likes to read books.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢读书。

sentences.en: Doing morning exercises helps me start the day with energy.
sentences.zh: 做早操帮助我精力充沛地开始新的一天。

sentences.en: We often see elderly people doing morning exercises in the park.
sentences.zh: 我们经常看到老年人在公园里做早操。

sentences.en: We are having class now.
sentences.zh: 我们现在正在上课。

sentences.en: She likes having class with her friends.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢和朋友们一起上课。

sentences.en: I am eating lunch with my friends.
sentences.zh: 我正在和朋友们吃午饭。

sentences.en: She usually eats lunch at twelve o'clock.
sentences.zh: 她通常十二点吃午饭。

sentences.en: She enjoys reading a book in the park.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在公园里看书。

sentences.en: I spend an hour reading a book before bed.
sentences.zh: 我睡前花一小时看书。

sentences.en: She enjoys listening to music every evening.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢每天晚上听音乐。

sentences.en: Listening to music helps me relax after work.
sentences.zh: 听音乐帮助我下班后放松。

sentences.en: I need to keep studying every day.
sentences.zh: 我需要每天坚持学习。

sentences.en: Please keep the book on the desk.
sentences.zh: 请把书放在桌子上。

sentences.en: When walking on the sidewalk, remember to keep to the right.
sentences.zh: 走在人行道上时，记得靠右行。

sentences.en: In many countries, people keep to the right while driving.
sentences.zh: 在许多国家，人们开车时靠右行驶。

sentences.en: Remember to keep your desk clean every day.
sentences.zh: 记得每天保持你的书桌干净。

sentences.en: A clean desk helps you focus better, so keep your desk clean.
sentences.zh: 干净的书桌能帮助你更好地集中注意力，所以要保持书桌干净。

sentences.en: Please talk quietly in the library.
sentences.zh: 请在图书馆小声说话。

sentences.en: The teacher told us to talk quietly during the test.
sentences.zh: 老师告诉我们考试时要小声说话。

sentences.en: It's your turn to speak now.
sentences.zh: 现在轮到你说话了。

sentences.en: Take turns to answer the questions.
sentences.zh: 轮流回答问题。

sentences.en: We take turns to play the game.
sentences.zh: 我们轮流玩游戏。

sentences.en: Please take turns to answer the questions.
sentences.zh: 请轮流回答问题。

sentences.en: Pandas love to eat bamboo.
sentences.zh: 熊猫喜欢吃竹子。

sentences.en: Bamboo is a fast-growing plant.
sentences.zh: 竹子是一种生长迅速的植物。

zh: （指事物、动物或幼儿）它的；他的；她的

sentences.en: The cat chased its tail.
sentences.zh: 猫追着它的尾巴。

sentences.en: This book has its own cover.
sentences.zh: 这本书有它自己的封面。

sentences.en: Can you show me your new book?
sentences.zh: 你能给我看看你的新书吗？

sentences.en: She likes to show her drawings to friends.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢把她的画展示给朋友们看。

sentences.en: Is there anything I can help you with?
sentences.zh: 有什么我可以帮忙的吗？

sentences.en: She didn't say anything about the party.
sentences.zh: 她没说任何关于聚会的事。

sentences.en: We visited an art exhibition last weekend.
sentences.zh: 我们上周末参观了一个艺术展览。

sentences.en: The science exhibition will open next month.
sentences.zh: 这个科学展览将于下个月开幕。

sentences.en: I can say my name.
sentences.zh: 我能说出我的名字。

sentences.en: Please say hello to her.
sentences.zh: 请向她问好。

sentences.en: Can I have a look at your new book?
sentences.zh: 我能看一眼你的新书吗？

sentences.en: She stopped to have a look at the beautiful flowers.
sentences.zh: 她停下来看了看那些漂亮的花。

sentences.en: I like to eat sushi with soy sauce.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢蘸酱油吃寿司。

sentences.en: Sushi is a traditional Japanese food made with rice and fish.
sentences.zh: 寿司是一种用米饭和鱼做的传统日本食物。

sentences.en: My teacher likes to teach us English.
sentences.zh: 我的老师喜欢教我们英语。

sentences.en: Can you teach me how to swim?
sentences.zh: 你能教我如何游泳吗？

sentences.en: Sure, I can help you with that.
sentences.zh: 当然，我可以帮你做那件事。

sentences.en: She said sure when I asked for help.
sentences.zh: 当我请求帮助时，她说当然可以。

sentences.en: She has a Canadian friend who loves maple syrup.
sentences.zh: 她有一个喜欢枫糖浆的加拿大朋友。

sentences.en: Canadian winters are usually very cold with lots of snow.
sentences.zh: 加拿大的冬天通常很冷，有很多雪。

sentences.en: She is learning Spanish at school.
sentences.zh: 她正在学校学习西班牙语。

sentences.en: Spanish is spoken in many countries like Spain and Mexico.
sentences.zh: 西班牙语在许多国家使用，比如西班牙和墨西哥。
